stanza.line: O never say that I was false of heartheart
Though absence seemed my flame to qualifyqualify
As easy might I from my self departdepart
As from my soul which in thy breast doth lielie
That is my home of love if I have rangedranged
Like him that travels I return againagain
Just to the time not with the time exchangedexchanged
So that my self bring water for my stainstain
Never believe though in my nature reignedreigned
All frailties that besiege all kinds of bloodblood
That it could so preposterously be stainedstained
To leave for nothing all thy sum of goodgood
For nothing this wide universe I callcall
Save thou my rose in it thou art my allall
